item.description:
Welcome!!

Doors open at 6:45, then until 7:00, we'll meet, mingle, munch food, enjoy drinks and introduce ourselves.
Our program tonight will be on delegating to the universe.

We all have times periodically when we have too much to get done and not enought time to get it all done in. Come tonight to and learn a fun tecnique ofhow to delegate to the universe for assistance. Life is meant to be fun and passionate, not heavy and hard. If you are smiling while you are reading this you know what I mean. If you are not smiling then you really need to come to class.

Each month the goal is to learn a techinque to move us in to less resistance and more acceptance of the life force around us and in understanding how to use it to benefit our lives. It is free to use and works wonderfully when we ask, believe and receive it's blessings.

Please come, you will be amazed at what you take home!!
Sincererly,
Barb
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for "The Abundance Meetup"

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Give it up to the Universe- Abundance December Meetup
